name: Hunting Shark Simulator 3D
description:
Hunt and explore ocean depths with the most dangerous predators - sharks! In Hunting Shark simulator you are a true scourge of the seas and oceans.

4 SPECIES OF SHARKS
Each with its special appearance and characteristics

3 SPECIAL SKILLS
Hunt, earn gold, upgrade skills for more long and exciting hunt

3 DECOR ITEMS
Create your unique image with accessories

HUNTING MISSIONS
Swim and eat fish and other sea inhabitants

UNEXPECTED DANGERS
Avoid depth charges, they damage sharks' tough skin

EXPLORING DEPTHS
Start from the water surface and reach the deepest places.

REMEMBER: the lower you want to go, the more deep water shark you need.

Start the underwater adventure to the ocean depths together with sharks right now!
